item.title: Marriage status and earnings
item.description: A common explanation for inequality among conservative types stresses the importance of marriage. The logic boils down to two basic points, one directly influential and one less directly influential. The first point claims married couples are more productive. Even those dependent on a single paycheck work together towards a common goal. Here, a wife looks after the home and children, while the husband earns a paycheck.
